headings.content: DeFi Skeptic. A Platform Designed to Better DeFi.

texts.content: Enhancing Decentralized Finance via project vetting, user- and developer-tailored products and services, powered by a token built to last.

items.title: Products & Services
items.subtitle: Utility
items.description: DeFi Skeptic provides various products and services centered towards DeFi developers and DeFi users. The bulk of these products and services are powered by Skeptic Token.

items.title: Skeptic Token (SKP)
items.subtitle: Token
items.description: This ecosystem of products and services will be power by Skeptic Token (SKP), a liquidity backed token with a unique deflationary mechanism not volume dependent which we call the "Burn Fund”.

items.title: First Skeptics
items.subtitle: NFT
items.description: The "First Skeptics” non-fungible token (NFT) is a limited set of 250 unique pieces. These NFTs will provide the holder with various benefits within the DeFi Skeptic ecosystem. They consist of 50 “rare” and 200 “common” pieces, each class with its own unique benefits.

items.title: Partners & Affiliates
items.subtitle: Strategy
items.description: The DeFi Skeptic team is a strong believer in collaboration over competition. Working with like minded platforms/projects and sharing each others resources is a key component of DeFi Skeptic and a valued aspect of our platform.
